text: Paul Heller (also known as Paul M. Heller; 25 September 1927 – 28 December 2020) was an American movie producer. His best known movies include Enter the Dragon, The Wilby Conspiracy, Withnail and I, My Left Foot, The Annihilation of Fish, Skin Games, Hot Potato, The Promise, Black Belt Jones, and David and Lisa. Heller died on 28 December 2020, aged 93.‘Withnail & I’, ‘Enter The Dragon’ producer Paul Heller dies at 93 ==References== Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Paul Heller
